title: Common Data Format (CDF)
text:
CDF Home Page
CDFpp : A modern C++ header only cdf library with Python bindings



source

cdf2pl

 cdf2pl (file_path:str, var_names:str|list[str])

Convert a CDF file to Polars Dataframe.









Type
Details




file_path
str
The path to the CDF file.


var_names
str | list[str]
The name(s) of the variable(s) to retrieve from the CDF file.


Returns
LazyFrame
A lazy dataframe containing the requested data.

Magnetic field data

title: Missions
text:
This module includes helpful functions for working with mission (magnetic field and plasma) data. We currently support the following missions:

Parker Solar Probe
Juno
Wind
THEMIS/ARTEMIS
STEREO


References

PySPEDAS: Python-based Space Physics Environment Data Analysis Software
speasy: A simple Python package to deal with main Space Physics WebServices (CDA,SSC,AMDA,..)
